proposal: Launch new mobile app to production on February 1st, 2026
context: App is currently in beta with 500 active users
Marketing campaign is already scheduled and ads are purchased
Engineering team consists of 4 developers (3 backend, 1 frontend)
No dedicated DevOps or SRE, developers handle deployments
No formal on-call rotation established yet
Current infrastructure: Single Heroku dyno, Postgres database, Redis cache
Beta users report occasional slowness during peak times
Support team is 2 people who also handle other products
stakeholders: Marketing team (already committed to launch date)
